text: remature or early growing together or fusing of the coronal suture. The coronal suture is found between the parts of the skull called the frontal bone and the two parietal bones. Forehead tends to be recessed and flattened.  Eye socket is elevated and tilted with protruding eyes.  Nose slants to one side.  Very small fingers (brachydactyl).
